Rep. Tom Suozzi (D-NY) makes it official & announced he will run for NY Governor in 2022, joining a crowded Democratic field seeking to challenge incumbent Gov. Hochul 

Suozzi becomes the 18th House Democrat not seeking re-election in 2022 ‚Äî the 8th running for other offices

Suozzi on Sunday turned down a job offer to join NYC Mayor-elect Eric Adams' administration as Deputy mayor 

It is also Suozzi's second attempt for the NY governorship. In 2006, Suozzi lost the Democratic primary bid to Eliot Spitzer by 63 points

So why are scientists full it? More particularly why are none of them interesting and certainly will never be an Einstein is due the gate keeping that occurs in sciences this is nothing new Eric Weinsteins has been exposing this for years. But here‚Äôs how it works.

To be successful in Big Science (in academia) you need to bring home the bacon. You do this through publishing in high end journals. This is done by researching what journals are excited about which is typically a buzzword of some kind. Then once you publish and get papers you can apply for grants where you propose to continue further research into a buzzword topic that everyone studies.
